verses.verse: וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot Now these [are] the names הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <S%H7626><s%> hash-she-va-Tim; of the tribes מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh end צָפ֡וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah From the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad to the coast דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech- of the way חֶתְלֹ֣ן׀ <S%H2855><s%> chet-Lon of Hethlon לְֽבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> le-Vo- as one goeth חֲמָ֡ת <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat to Hamath חֲצַ֣ר cha-Tzar עֵינָן֩ <S%H2704><s%> 'ei-Nan Hazarenan גְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul the border דַּמֶּ֤שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> dam-Me-sek of Damascus צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah northward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad to the coast חֲמָ֔ת <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat, of Hamath וְהָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-yu- running ל֧וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo פְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> fe-'at- for these are his sides קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim east הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam [and] west דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> dan [portion for] Dan אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border דָּ֗ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan, of Dan מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah unto the west אָשֵׁ֥ר <S%H836><s%> 'a-Sher [portion for] Asher אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border אָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> 'a-Sher, of Asher מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ימָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah from the east וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah even unto the west נַפְתָּלִ֥י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li [portion for] Naphtali אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border נַפְתָּלִ֗י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛מָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah unto the west מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh [portion for] Manasseh אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛מָה <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah unto the west אֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim [portion for] Ephraim אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim from the east וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah even unto the west רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven [portion for] Reuben אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah unto the west יְהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah [portion for] Judah אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and by גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And by the border יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מִפְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah; unto the west תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become הַתְּרוּמָ֣ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah shall be the offering אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- which תָּרִ֡ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu which ye shall offer חֲמִשָּׁה֩ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav, [reeds in] breadth וְאֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> ve-'O-rech and [in] length כְּאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> ke-'a-Chad as one הַחֲלָקִים֙ <S%H2506><s%> ha-cha-la-Kim of the [other] parts מִפְּאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H6921><s%> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- side יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, unto the west וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash and the sanctuary בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cho. shall be in the midst

הַתְּרוּמָ֕ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah The oblation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תָּרִ֖ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu that ye shall offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, in length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah [shall be] of five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret and of ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וּ֠לְאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> u-le-'El-leh another תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become תְרֽוּמַת־ <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-mat- oblation הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-Desh shall be [this] holy לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֒ <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim And for them [even] for the priests צָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah toward the north חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וְיָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> ve-Yam-mah [in length] and toward the west רֹ֚חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְקָדִ֗ימָה <S%H6921><s%> ve-ka-Di-mah, and toward the east רֹ֚חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְנֶ֕גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> ve-Neg-bah and toward the south אֹ֕רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech in length חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef; thousand וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become מִקְדַּשׁ־ <S%H4720><s%> mik-dash- and the sanctuary יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cho. shall be in the midst

לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim [It shall be] for the priests הַֽמְקֻדָּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> ham-kud-Dash that are sanctified מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons צָד֔וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok, of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who שָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Ru which have kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֑י <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-Ti; my charge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not תָע֗וּ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U, which went not astray בִּתְעוֹת֙ <S%H8582><s%> bit-'Ot went astray בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who תָּע֖וּ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U went astray הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. as the Levites ס sa-Mek

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem תְּרוּמִיָּ֛ה <S%H8642><s%> te-ru-mi-Yah And [this] oblation מִתְּרוּמַ֥ת <S%H8641><s%> mit-te-ru-Mat that is offered הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh shall be unto them a thing most קָדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim; holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- by גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul by the border הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim. of the Levites

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim, the Levites לְעֻמַּת֙ <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat And over against גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul the border הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim, of the priests חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah [shall have] five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, in length וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim; thousand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, all the length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall not יִמְכְּר֣וּ <S%H4376><s%> yim-ke-Ru And they shall not sell מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, any וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יָמֵ֛ר <S%H4171><s%> ya-Mer of it neither exchange וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not; יַעֲבוּר ya-'a-vur כיַעֲבִ֖יר <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vir alienate קרֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit the firstfruits הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh for [it is] holy לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַחֲמֵ֨שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Me-shet And the five אֲלָפִ֜ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand הַנּוֹתָ֣ר <S%H3498><s%> han-no-Tar that are left בָּרֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> ba-Ro-chav, in the breadth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei over against חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah the five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand חֹֽל־ <S%H2455><s%> chol- shall be a profane ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir, [place] for the city לְמוֹשָׁ֖ב <S%H4186><s%> le-mo-Shav for dwelling וּלְמִגְרָ֑שׁ <S%H4054><s%> u-le-mig-Rash; and for suburbs וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir and the city; בְּתֹוכֹה be-to-choh כבְּתֹוכֹֽו׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cho. hope ק

וְאֵלֶּה֮ <S%H428><s%> ve-'el-Leh another מִדּוֹתֶיהָ֒ <S%H4060><s%> mid-do-tei-Ha And these [shall be] the measures פְּאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> pe-'At side צָפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon, thereof the north חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> u-fe-'at- side נֶ֕גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev and the south חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five; חֲמֵשׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mesh fif כמֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim; thousand וּמִפְּאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> u-mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֗ים <S%H6921><s%> ka-Dim, and on the east חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> u-fe-'at- side יָ֕מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah and the west חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh fif מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim. thousand
